CelestialGrenade.name: Celestial Grenade
CelestialGrenade.description: Summons a deity for one minute.
CelestialGrenade.effect: Summons a deity for one minute.

GoblinSmokeBomb.name: Goblin Smoke Bomb
GoblinSmokeBomb.description: Emits a cloud of stinking yellowish-green opaque smoke.
GoblinSmokeBomb.effect: Emits a cloud of stinking multi-color opaque smoke.

HobgoblinSmokeCurtain.name: Hobgoblin Smoke Curtain
HobgoblinSmokeCurtain.description: Coats the area in dense white fog affecting physical entities.
HobgoblinSmokeCurtain.effect: Coats the area in dense white fog affecting physical entities.

HobgoblinDiscoBall.name: Hobgoblin Disco Ball
HobgoblinDiscoBall.description: A Magically-infused Deflagrating Tossable. Take a Hobgoblin smoke curtain, soak it in an invisibility potion, and what do you get? You get a party, that’s what you get! Produces heavy, multi-hued billows of smoke that are both photosensitive and frequency responsive. And in case you don’t know what that means, just set one off and find out. The smoke will conceal all movement within, and the plumes will bounce to the beat. Molly not included. Warning: Unlike a regular smoke curtain, the caster of this tossable is not immune to its effects. In other words, you’ll be just as blind as the monsters. So you don’t want to be dropping this thing at your feet unless you find yourself to be the most handsome dude at the orgy.
HobgoblinDiscoBall.effect: When thrown, the Hobgoblin Disco Ball creates a 30-foot radius of multi-hued, frequency-responsive smoke. All within this area have their vision obscured, suffer disadvantage to perception checks, and have a -5 penalty on all checks involving combat, physical, and social skills. The smoke also reacts to sounds and light, swirling and flashing in response to noise and movement, causing disorientation. Hmmmm I wonder if there's anything one could do to make that even worse... huh, oh well. Anyone attempting to navigate or act within the smoke must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or suffer disadvantage on all actions. The smoke lasts for 3 minutes unless dispersed by strong winds or magic.

SpectralFoghorn.name: Spectral Foghorn
SpectralFoghorn.description: A Magically-infused Deflagrating Tossable. Take a Hobgoblin smoke curtain, soak it in an invisibility potion, and what do you get? You get a party, that’s what you get! Produces heavy, multi-hued billows of smoke that are both photosensitive and frequency responsive. And in case you don’t know what that means, just set one off and find out. The smoke will conceal all movement within, and the plumes will bounce to the beat. Molly not included. Warning: Unlike a regular smoke curtain, the caster of this tossable is not immune to its effects. In other words, you’ll be just as blind as the monsters. So you don’t want to be dropping this thing at your feet unless you find yourself to be the most handsome dude at the orgy.
SpectralFoghorn.effect: Creates a 40-foot radius fog that causes all creatures within to hear distorted sounds and see ghostly apparitions. Affected creatures must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened and disoriented, moving in random directions for 1d4 rounds.

PandemoniumPoppers.name: Pandemonium Poppers
PandemoniumPoppers.description: Forget confetti; these poppers explode with a randomized curse buffet. Throw one into a crowd and watch the mayhem multiply like bunnies on a blind date. It’s chaos theory in a very literal, very explosive form.
PandemoniumPoppers.effect: Creates a 15-foot radius of unpredictable chaos. Each creature within must roll on the Chaos Effect Table to determine a random effect, such as glowing pink, uncontrolled dancing, or being covered in feathers.
PandemoniumPoppers.duration: Instantaneous effects, but lingering chaos lasts 30 seconds

uniqueAbilities.Chaos Effect Table: Roll 1d10 for a random effect (e.g., glowing, dancing, teleporting)

GoblinGlueGrenade.name: Goblin Glue Grenade
GoblinGlueGrenade.description: A thick glass sphere filled with a highly adhesive alchemical concoction designed to trap and immobilize.
GoblinGlueGrenade.effect: Upon impact, spreads a thick, sticky substance over a 20-foot radius. Creatures in the area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or become restrained.
GoblinGlueGrenade.duration: 10 minutes or until the glue is broken

uniqueAbilities.Sticky Trap: Creatures can attempt a DC 16 Strength check to break free.

RumbleTumbleTonic.name: Rumble Tumble Tonic
RumbleTumbleTonic.description: Take a sip and set the world spinning—literally. This concoction stirs up the ground like a toddler with a spoon in a pot. It’s like playing 'The Floor is Lava' but with more realistic screaming.
RumbleTumbleTonic.effect: Creates a 30-foot radius area of heaving, rolling terrain. Creatures must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw each round or be knocked prone.

GoblinConfettiCanon.name: Goblin Confetti Canon
GoblinConfettiCanon.description: A handheld cannon that launches a concentrated blast of colorful, blinding confetti. Not all cannons need to be deadly. This one’s lethal in a different way—blasting your enemies' senses with a riot of color and paper cuts. Turns any somber battlefield into a rave of confusion.
GoblinConfettiCanon.effect: Shoots a 15-foot cone of sharp, stinging confetti. Creatures hit suffer disadvantage on their next attack roll.

TinkersTonic.name: Tinker’s Tonic
TinkersTonic.description: A bubbling, bright blue potion. Who needs bees when you can have mechanical bees that don’t sting... they drill! Shatter this bottle and send a horde of tiny, buzzing nuisances that will make your target regret their life decisions.
TinkersTonic.effect: Releases a swarm of tiny, clockwork bees in a 30-foot radius. Creatures must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be distracted, suffering disadvantage on concentration checks and ranged attacks.

ShadowstepGrenade.name: Shadowstep Grenade
ShadowstepGrenade.description: A grenade crafted from shadow-infused glass that creates a zone of magical darkness. Imagine the darkest, saddest corner of the universe, like that closet you used to find your mom crying in after your dad left for work—now throw this grenade and watch that corner come to life. It sucks in light like Taylor Swift sucked in her fan's souls to pay her debt to the devil. Ideal for surprise parties and ambushes, or simply when you want to literally throw some shade.
ShadowstepGrenade.effect: Creates a 20-foot radius of impenetrable darkness, rendering all creatures within invisible but also blind.

NightgauntLaughingGas.name: Night Gaunt Laughing Gas
NightgauntLaughingGas.description: Ever seen a battle-hardened orc giggle like a schoolgirl? You will. Unleash this canister of absurdity and watch seasoned warriors collapse into helpless, giggling heaps. It’s war, it’s chaos, it’s comedy gold.
NightgauntLaughingGas.effect: Covers a 15-foot radius; creatures must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become incapacitated with laughter.

GremlinGreaseBomb.name: Gremlin Grease Bomb
GremlinGreaseBomb.description: This isn’t just grease; it’s the nightmare version of a banana peel. Lob it into the fray and watch the world's most lethal slapstick routine unfold. Best used when you can hang around to point and laugh.
GremlinGreaseBomb.effect: Covers a 25-foot radius with a thick, slippery substance. Creatures must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

MirageBlossom.name: Mirage Blossom
MirageBlossom.description: It looks like a harmless flower, but so did your first crush—and look how that turned out. This botanical beast unleashes a pollen that's less 'springtime frolic' and more 'trip without the fun'. Watch as foes claw at phantoms, or better, each other.
MirageBlossom.effect: Releases a 40-foot radius cloud of hallucinogenic pollen, causing vivid hallucinations.

SonicShatterSphere.name: Sonic Shatter Sphere
SonicShatterSphere.description: Break this if you hate conversation—or eardrums. The resulting sonic boom doesn’t whisper sweet nothings; it screams unmentionables that leave you clutching your head and probably bleeding from your eyes.
SonicShatterSphere.effect: Releases a 30-foot radius wave of sonic energy, deafening all creatures in the area.

Impact Detonated Hob Lobber.name: Impact Detonated Hob-Lobber
Impact Detonated Hob Lobber.description: The Impact Detonated Hob-Lobber is for when you absolutely, positively need something to go boom the moment it hits. Engineered with the precision of a catapult and the subtlety of a sledgehammer, this bad boy explodes on contact, turning enemies into a fine mist of regret and shrapnel.
Impact Detonated Hob Lobber.effect: Explodes on impact, dealing explosive damage to all in a 10-foot radius.

additionalEffects.name: Explosive Impact
additionalEffects.description: Deals an additional 2d6 fire damage if the target is wearing metal armor.

additionalEffects.name: Shrapnel Spread
additionalEffects.description: Anyone within the blast radius must make a Dexterity save (DC 15) or take 4d6 piercing damage.

Timed Fuse Hob Lobber.name: Timed Fuse Hob-Lobber
Timed Fuse Hob Lobber.description: The Timed Fuse Hob-Lobber is perfect for the patient bomber who enjoys watching their enemies' brief moment of realization before everything goes up in flames. Set the timer, lob it, and enjoy the fireworks from a safe distance.
Timed Fuse Hob Lobber.effect: Explodes after a set duration, dealing explosive damage in a 20-foot radius.

additionalEffects.name: Delayed Blast
additionalEffects.description: Can be set to explode up to 30 seconds after being thrown.

additionalEffects.name: Smoke Screen
additionalEffects.description: Creates a 10-foot radius smoke screen that provides partial cover (+2 AC) for 1d4 rounds.

additionalEffects.name: Shrapnel Spread
additionalEffects.description: Anyone within the blast radius must make a Dexterity save (DC 15) or take 4d6 piercing damage.

Timed Fuse Hob Lobber.triggerMechanism: Timed Fuse (2 seconds by default, adjustable up to 30 seconds)

Solid Standard Hob Lobber.name: Solid Standard Hob-Lobber
Solid Standard Hob Lobber.description: For the traditionalist who believes that sometimes, simple is best. The Solid Standard Hob-Lobber delivers a powerful hit without the frills and explosions, making it ideal for those who prefer their projectiles solid and deadly.
Solid Standard Hob Lobber.effect: Delivers a solid impact capable of knocking back targets.

additionalEffects.name: Knockback
additionalEffects.description: Targets hit by this ammunition must make a Strength save (DC 14) or be knocked back 10 feet.

additionalEffects.name: Armor Piercing
additionalEffects.description: Ignores 2 points of target's armor rating.

Sticky Hob Lobber.name: Sticky Hob-Lobber
Sticky Hob Lobber.description: The Sticky Hob-Lobber is for the sneaky demolitions expert who enjoys watching their enemies struggle in vain before meeting a fiery end. This adhesive grenade clings to any surface, including unfortunate enemies, and ensures they can't shake off their imminent doom. Perfect for those 'sticky' situations where a little extra explosive persuasion is needed.
Sticky Hob Lobber.effect: Adheres to any surface or creature, detonating after a short delay or upon remote detonation.

additionalEffects.name: Cling-On
additionalEffects.description: The Sticky Hob-Lobber adheres to any surface or creature it hits. Targets stuck with this explosive must make a Strength save (DC 16) to remove it before detonation.

additionalEffects.name: Remote Detonation
additionalEffects.description: The user can choose to detonate the Sticky Hob-Lobber remotely within 60 feet.

additionalEffects.name: Silent Timer
additionalEffects.description: Emits no sound during its delay period, giving enemies no hint of the impending explosion.

additionalEffects.name: Shrapnel Spread
additionalEffects.description: Anyone within the blast radius must make a Dexterity save (DC 15) or take 4d6 piercing damage.

Sticky Hob Lobber.triggerMechanism: Adhesive (sticks on impact) with a 3-second delay or remote detonation
